text: Ropica exocentroides is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Pascoe in 1859. It is known from Australia.BioLib.cz - Ropica exocentroides. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Ropica (genus) Category:Beetles described in 1859
title: Ropica exocentroides
